PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05402022-05-19,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActFederal Courts Act
SubjectCommissioners for Administering Oaths ** Federal Court of Appeal or the Federal Court **
PrecisOrder directing that COMMISSIONS do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering 27 registry officers of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, in or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the FEDERAL COURT OF APPEAL or the FEDERAL COURT.
AttachmentsAttachment
